snippet: In the city’s old cultural center, young Senegalese stroll around in modern looks that mix traditional garments with what locals call “European style” clothing.
abstract: Mamadou Sow, spotted on street in Dakar, Senegal, mixes traditional Senegalese clothing with European style.
lead_paragraph: In the city’s old cultural center, young Senegalese stroll around in modern looks that mix traditional garments with what locals call “European style” clothing.

headline.print_headline: As Different as Night and Day
